name: Usefulbookmark
tagline: Personal bookmark tools to do something useful
body:
# UsefulBookmark Open specific webpage, click a bookmark in bookmarks bar, then something happend. That's all I want.

Now, this repo is just a collection of bookmarks with simply features. Maybe they will to be a all-in-one tool, or userscript in future. ## Bookmark list * Shared2Weibo: 分享当前页面到新浪微博，你可以选择页面上的一张图片进行分享。
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
